item.entry:
This is the services module. It's XML driven and independent from the main template. It was used to display some services, but can be used for any other purpose (display clients, team members, news, events, etc).

The news module allows you to display some entries - <font color="#666666">title, body and image</font> - for some event and group them by years or months. With a few adaptaptions on the text (ALL edited inside the respective XML file) you may use this module to display any other type of information you find necessary.
